sentences.sContent: The last decade has witnessed a serious rise in the levels of racism and hostility to black and ethnic groups.
sentences.sCn: 过去的10年里，种族主义及对黑人和少数民族的敌意变得更加严重了。

words.tran: 敌对的，敌方的；怀敌意的

trans.tranCn: 敌对， 不友好； 憎恨
trans.tranOther: Hostility is unfriendly or aggressive behaviour toward people or ideas
